languages.text: "Мой наставник выдвинул тезис, что мы впали в стагнацию. Что Ритуал стал клеткой душ, ложным почитанием {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Омниссии{/g}. Он желал прервать цикл бездумного повторения, так как видел в конце его неизменную гибель нашей веры и всего Человечества".

traits.locale_text: "Мой наставник выдвинул тезис, что мы впали в стагнацию. Что Ритуал стал клеткой душ, ложным почитанием {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Омниссии{/g}. Он желал прервать цикл бездумного повторения, так как видел в конце его неизменную гибель нашей веры и всего Человечества".
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "My mentor put forth a thesis claiming that we have stagnated, that Ritual is now nothing but a cage for souls and false worship of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}. He sought to break the cycle of mindless repetition because he saw the inevitable demise of our faith and all Humanity at the end of it."
languages.original_text: "Мой наставник выдвинул тезис, что мы впали в стагнацию. Что Ритуал стал клеткой душ, ложным почитанием {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Омниссии{/g}. Он желал прервать цикл бездумного повторения, так как видел в конце его неизменную гибель нашей веры и всего Человечества".

traits.locale_text: "My mentor put forward a thesis claiming that we have stagnated. That Ritual became a cage for souls, false worship of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}. He sought to break the cycle of mindless repetition because he saw the inevitable demise of our faith and the entire Mankind at the end of it."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "My mentor put forward a thesis claiming that we have stagnated. That Ritual became a cage for souls, false worship of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}. He sought to break the cycle of mindless repetition because he saw the inevitable demise of our faith and the entire Mankind at the end of it."

He sought to break the cycle of mindless repetition because he saw the inevitable demise of our faith and all Humanity at the end of it."

He sought to break the cycle of mindless repetition because he saw the inevitable demise of our faith and all Humanity at the end of it."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "My mentor put forth a thesis claiming that we have stagnated, that Ritual is now nothing but a cage for souls and false worship of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}. He sought to break the cycle of mindless repetition because he saw the inevitable demise of our faith and all Humanity at the end of it."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “我的导师提出了一个论题。他声称我们已经停滞不前，如今的仪式仅仅是囚禁灵魂的牢笼，是对{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}欧姆尼塞亚{/g}的虚假崇拜。他想打破盲目的重复循环。因为他已经看到，在重复循环的终点处，我们的信仰与所有人类都将迎来不可避免的灭亡。”
languages.original_text: "My mentor put forth a thesis claiming that we have stagnated, that Ritual is now nothing but a cage for souls and false worship of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}. He sought to break the cycle of mindless repetition because he saw the inevitable demise of our faith and all Humanity at the end of it."

traits.locale_text: “我的导师提出了一个论题。他声称我们已经停滞不前，如今的仪式仅仅是囚禁灵魂的牢笼，是对{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}欧姆尼塞亚{/g}的虚假崇拜。他想打破盲目的重复循环。因为他已经看到，在重复循环的终点处，我们的信仰与所有人类都将迎来不可避免的灭亡。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Mi mentor propuso una tesis que afirmaba que nos hemos estancado, que los rituales son solo una jaula para las almas y para rendir un falso homenaje al {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}. Buscaba romper el ciclo de repetición descerebrada porque veía en su final la muerte de nuestra fe y de toda la humanidad».
languages.original_text: "My mentor put forth a thesis claiming that we have stagnated, that Ritual is now nothing but a cage for souls and false worship of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}. He sought to break the cycle of mindless repetition because he saw the inevitable demise of our faith and all Humanity at the end of it."

traits.locale_text: «Mi mentor propuso una tesis que afirmaba que nos hemos estancado, que los rituales son solo una jaula para las almas y para rendir un falso homenaje al {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}. Buscaba romper el ciclo de repetición descerebrada porque veía en su final la muerte de nuestra fe y de toda la humanidad».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「私の師は、私たちは停滞しており、儀式は今や魂の檻に過ぎず、{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}万機神{/g}への偽りの崇拝に過ぎないと主張する論文を発表した。彼は無頓着に循環するサイクルを断ち切ろうとした。彼は、私たちの信仰と、その果てにある人類全体の避けがたい終焉を見たのだ」
languages.original_text: "My mentor put forth a thesis claiming that we have stagnated, that Ritual is now nothing but a cage for souls and false worship of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}. He sought to break the cycle of mindless repetition because he saw the inevitable demise of our faith and all Humanity at the end of it."

traits.locale_text: 「私の師は、私たちは停滞しており、儀式は今や魂の檻に過ぎず、{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}万機神{/g}への偽りの崇拝に過ぎないと主張する論文を発表した。彼は無頓着に循環するサイクルを断ち切ろうとした。彼は、私たちの信仰と、その果てにある人類全体の避けがたい終焉を見たのだ」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Mein Mentor stellte die These auf, dass wir der Stagnation anheimgefallen seien. Dass das Ritual inzwischen nur noch ein Käfig für Seelen und für falsche Verehrung des {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} sei. Er wollte den Kreislauf der gedankenlosen Repetition durchbrechen, weil er an dessen Ende den unweigerlichen Niedergang unseres Glaubens und der gesamten Menschheit sah."
languages.original_text: "My mentor put forth a thesis claiming that we have stagnated, that Ritual is now nothing but a cage for souls and false worship of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}. He sought to break the cycle of mindless repetition because he saw the inevitable demise of our faith and all Humanity at the end of it."

traits.locale_text: "Mein Mentor stellte die These auf, dass wir der Stagnation anheimgefallen seien. Dass das Ritual inzwischen nur noch ein Käfig für Seelen und für falsche Verehrung des {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} sei. Er wollte den Kreislauf der gedankenlosen Repetition durchbrechen, weil er an dessen Ende den unweigerlichen Niedergang unseres Glaubens und der gesamten Menschheit sah."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Mon mentor a émis une théorie selon laquelle nous serions en stagnation, et le Rituel ne serait rien de plus qu'une cage spirituelle favorisant un culte fautif de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnimessie{/g}. Il cherchait à briser le cycle des répétitions machinales, ayant vu la disparition inévitable de notre foi et de toute l'humanité à sa suite. »
languages.original_text: "My mentor put forth a thesis claiming that we have stagnated, that Ritual is now nothing but a cage for souls and false worship of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}. He sought to break the cycle of mindless repetition because he saw the inevitable demise of our faith and all Humanity at the end of it."

traits.locale_text: « Mon mentor a émis une théorie selon laquelle nous serions en stagnation, et le Rituel ne serait rien de plus qu'une cage spirituelle favorisant un culte fautif de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnimessie{/g}. Il cherchait à briser le cycle des répétitions machinales, ayant vu la disparition inévitable de notre foi et de toute l'humanité à sa suite. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: "My mentor put forth a thesis claiming that we have stagnated, that Ritual is now nothing but a cage for souls and false worship of the Omnissiah. He sought to break the cycle of mindless repetition because he saw the inevitable demise of our faith and all Humanity at the end of it."

languages.text: "Yönderim; duraklamada olduğumuzu, Ayin'in ruhlar için bir kafes olduğunu, {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Hermesih'e{/g} yanlış bir ibadet biçiminden başka bir şey olmadığını iddia eden bir tez öne sürdü. Sürekli aynı yerde dönüp durduğumuz bu akıl dışı döngüyü kırmak istedi çünkü inancımızın kaçınılmaz çöküşünü, tüm İnsanlığın da onuna birlikte sonunun geleceğini gördü."
languages.original_text: "My mentor put forth a thesis claiming that we have stagnated, that Ritual is now nothing but a cage for souls and false worship of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}. He sought to break the cycle of mindless repetition because he saw the inevitable demise of our faith and all Humanity at the end of it."

traits.locale_text: "Yönderim; duraklamada olduğumuzu, Ayin'in ruhlar için bir kafesten ve {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Hermesih{/g}'e yanlış bir ibadet biçiminden başka bir şey olmadığını iddia eden bir tez öne sürdü. Bu sürekli aynı yerde döndüğümüz akıl dışı döngüyü kırmak istedi çünkü inancımızın kaçınılmaz çöküşünü, tüm İnsanlığın da onuna birlikte sona ereceğini gördü."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
